typedef enum {

WASM_OP_I32ATOMICRMWOR = 0x33,

unit.function_decl: R_IPI int wasm_asm(const char *str, unsigned char *buf, int buf_len);
R_IPI int wasm_dis(WasmOp *op, const unsigned char *buf, int buf_len);
